00001 // This may look like C code, but it is really -*- C++ -*-
00002 #ifndef POINT__H
00003 #define POINT__H
00004 #include <iostream>
00005 #include <cmath>
00006 using namespace std;
00007 
00010 
00011 class Point {
00012 public:
00014    double x,y;
00015 
00017    Point(const double &xx=0, const double &yy=0) : x(xx), y(yy) {};
00018 
00020    double Distance(const Point& Other) const { return sqrt((x-Other.x)*(x-Other.x) + (y-Other.y)*(y-Other.y));};
00021 
00023    double Dist2(const Point& Other) const { return ((x-Other.x)*(x-Other.x) + (y-Other.y)*(y-Other.y));};
00024 
00026    template<class Operator> void Apply(const Operator &Op) { *this = Op(*this);}
00027 
00029   Point operator + (const Point &Right) const { return Point(x+Right.x, y+Right.y);}
00030 
00031 
00033   Point operator - (const Point &Right) const { return Point(x-Right.x, y-Right.y);}
00034 
00035   virtual void dump(ostream& s = cout) const { s <<" x " << x << " y " << y;}  
00036 
00038      friend ostream& operator << (ostream& stream, const Point &point) 
00039     { stream << " x " << point.x << " y " << point.y; return stream;}
00040 };
